March 7, 1982 D Oldham Contest (Section 3)
Oldham Contest (Section 3) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
oldham-contest-section-3
None
Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £110 and cup, 2nd £90 and cup, 3rd £70. 8 bands competed. 11th annual contest.
June 19, 2014, 9:19 p.m. Jan. 27, 2015, 1:45 p.m.
